TopicTitle: Trying to land on the mun (stock) since ages, stuck.

Articles.Content:
Could anyone give me a good 0.13 stock (I have full version, but i want to try it in 0.13 first) mun rocket ?

I tried lots of designs, all failed :

-Can't achieve TMI, not enough fuel.

-Can't acheive orbital injection.

-Too heavy to lift off.

I even tried a ultralight, RCS-propelled lander. But stupid ASAS used all my RCS fuel to stabilise. Arriving on the mun, slowdown, WHAT NO MORE FUEL !!! Crash !

Also do you have some tips ?

PS : iff your rocket is using the new Mk1 pod but all other parts are 0.13 stock it's OK
Go to ship exchange forum. There are loads of ships that could do that with stack parts.
I did, but you have to go back to page 60 and more to find 0.13 things...
Try the rocket I use as of about 10 minutes into the first video, it's a rather 'friendly' rocket compared to some of my other designs:
